## MapViewFog class

Manages the fog display in \[\[MapView\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MapViewFog 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_scene)](./harp-mapview.mapviewfog._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a <code>MapViewFog</code> instance. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./harp-mapview.mapviewfog.enabled.md) |  | boolean | Returns the current fog status, enabled or disabled. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [reset(theme)](./harp-mapview.mapviewfog.reset.md) |  | Sets the fog depending on the \[\[Theme\]\] instance provided. This function is called when a theme is loaded. Fog is added only if the theme contains a fog definition with a: - <code>color</code> property, used to set the fog color. - <code>startRatio</code> property, used to set the start distance of the fog as a ratio of the far clipping plane distance. |
|  [update(mapView, viewDistance)](./harp-mapview.mapviewfog.update.md) |  | Updates the fog at runtime, depending on the camera. |
